headline: Trump Targets ‘Birth Tourism’ by Restricting Visas for Pregnant Women
abstract: The Trump administration granted visa officers more power to block pregnant women from visiting the United States if applicants were believed to be traveling to give birth.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The State Department on Thursday gave visa officers more power to block pregnant women from visiting the United States and directed them to stop so-called birth tourism, or trips designed to obtain citizenship for their children.
